channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Neya Systems designs N-Drive for off-road autonomy
item.description: Neya Systems said it has tested its N-Drive autonomy system in nearly every terrain on Earth using advanced simulation tools. The post Neya Systems de...

item.title: Rebuilding Alexa: How Amazon is mixing models, agents and browser-use for smarter AI
item.description: In rearchitecting the upgraded Alexa voice assistant, Amazon turned to model mixing to bring agentic capabilities to devices.

item.title: Nomagic raises $44M to scale European picking robot deployments
item.description: Nomagic said it reached deployment milestones with several clients, including Apo.com, Arvato, Asos, Brack, Fiege, Komplett, and Vetlog.one. The post ...

item.title: Yamaha Agriculture formed by Yamaha Motor acquisition of Robotics Plus
item.description: Yamaha Agriculture combines Robotics Plus' autonomous systems with The Yield's data analytics for specialty crop growers. The post Yamaha Agriculture ...

item.title: Swiss Re expects L.A. wildfires to cost the global insurance industry $40 billion, making them the costliest U.S. fires ever
item.description: Swiss Re said that its losses from the Los Angeles wildfires would come in under $700 million and that it had no plans to “pull back” from California.

item.title: ‘I’m an endless honey pot’: My wife and I are in our 70s. We gave our son $40,000 for his L.A. wedding. Now he wants more.
item.description: “We have four sons. We financed three of them through college, so none of our kids have student loans.”

item.title: Ampere accelerates expansion into telecom networking processors
item.description: Ampere is accelerating its expansion from Arm-based server processors for AI processing into networking chips for the telecom market.
